meanings.definition: The quality or state of being old-fashioned or out of date.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's datedness made her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent2: The datedness of the technology was evident in the lack of modern features.
meanings.sent3: Despite the datedness of the music, it still brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant's decor had a charming datedness that transported customers to another era.
meanings.sent5: The datedness of the car's design was a testament to its long history on the road.

meanings.definition: The act of determining the age of something.
meanings.sent1: The datedness of the artifact was crucial in understanding its historical significance.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists use various methods to establish the datedness of ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The detective's datedness of the document helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: The datedness of the tree rings revealed the age of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The datedness of the painting was confirmed through carbon dating.
